reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater smart-looking, with one noting it gives an expensive appearance, and appreciate its soft material and vibrant colors. The quality is impressive, and they consider it good value for money. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others wish it fit better. The bow stiffness is a concern, with one customer noting it could be stiffer and another mentioning it's diffi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This exceeds expectations
items.body: This is nicer than I expected. The bow is a matte silky material and ties and hangs nicely. It has just the right weight and gives the sweater an expensive look. It’s a shorter sweater and a bit boxy but that’s what I was looking for so it works for me. If you really want to go to the trouble you might want to replace the faux pearl buttons with some of higher quality. They are the weak point of this sweater but mostly hidden by the bow. Perfect for holiday parties! Read more
items.author: middleofnowhere

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute work top
items.body: It's cute and well made. If you have long arms or larger chested, the sleeves won't be long enough and there will be gaps around the bow. Read more
items.author: Julianne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dressy sweater.
items.body: Beautiful sweater. I sized up because some of the reviews said it runs small, but wish I had ordered my normal size. Didn’t have time to exchange so wore it anyway. Very nice for the price. Read more
items.author: Toni L

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks cheaper than what I expected
items.body: It’s cute and fit well but a lot of wrinkles. I will steam it and hopefully it will look better. I haven’t washed it yet so I don’t know how it will look after washing it. It looks cheaper than what I was expecting. Read more
items.author: Candy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Ruined by Packaging
items.body: Although this top was very cute, the packaging ruined it. The top arrived smashed in the package. It had creeses and folds that would not loosen. What a shame! The size was good (small). The weight and thickness of the top were as described...light weight. Would have been a great top for work and social events for fall weather. Read more
items.author: SArah Schreiber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made
items.body: Really nice top! Material is soft and I’m not tall, and it’s a perfect length for me. Highly recommend. True to size as I like tops a little big Read more
items.author: Deb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: It's a very smart looking sweater. Read more
items.author: karen helbert

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars hits at the waist
items.body: very nice sweater but it is short and the bow is difficult to keep straight Read more
items.author: Oma

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 1-cream, 3-pink, 5-white Stripe, 4-red, 2-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
